database.name: VIEW GAI_WORKSHEET_V
database.view: ( SELECT FA.FACT_ACCT_ID, FA.AD_CLIENT_ID, FA.AD_ORG_ID, FA.CREATED, FA.CREATEDBY, FA.UPDATED, FA.UPDATEDBY, FA.ISACTIVE, GK.VALUE, FA.C_PERIOD_ID, FA.DATETRX, FA.EM_GAI_DOCUMENTNO, FA.DESCRIPTION, FP.REFERENCENO, FA.AMTACCTDR, FA.AMTACCTCR, FA.ACCTVALUE, FA.ACCTDESCRIPTION, CE.VALUE AS KODE_INDUK, CE.NAME AS NAMA_INDUK FROM FACT_ACCT FA LEFT JOIN FIN_PAYMENT FP ON FP.FIN_PAYMENT_ID = FA.RECORD_ID LEFT JOIN C_INVOICE CI ON CI.C_INVOICE_ID = FA.RECORD_ID LEFT JOIN GAI_KANTOR GK ON GK.GAI_KANTOR_ID = FP.EM_GAI_KANTOR_ID LEFT JOIN AD_TREENODE ATN ON ATN.NODE_ID = FA.ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN C_ELEMENTVALUE CE ON CE.C_ELEMENTVALUE_ID = ATN.PARENT_ID)
